original_title: Where's the Beer and when do we get paid?
overview: Documentary about Jimmy Carl Black, the legendary drummer of Frank Zappa’s “Mothers of Invention”. He later lived in a small Bavarian village. The filmmakers followed his last two years of living and drumming and made a film about sex, drugs, Rock'n'Roll and no old age support.
tagline: An international Heimat movie about sex, drugs, rock ‘ n roll and no retirement funds
title: Where's the Beer and when do we get paid?
